name: The Least Scary Horror Game
description:
The Least Scary Horror Game is a horror game for those who are scared of ones! It combines puzzle mechanics with first person shooting.

Try the first chapter of the game for free!

You also have an arcade mode, where you must kill as many enemies as you can before the time runs out.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
E - Open/Pick
F - Use a picked up item on another item/Take weapons or ammo
Ctrl - Crouch
Left Mouse - Shoot
